section.title: Details
section.p: After initializing the SDK, the default channel profile is the live streaming profile. 你可以调用该方法设置频道的使用场景。 For example, it prioritizes smoothness and low latency for a video call, and prioritizes video quality for the interactive live video streaming.

ul.li: To ensure the quality of real-time communication, Agora recommends that all users in a channel use the same channel profile.
This method must be called and set before , and cannot be set again after joining the channel.
The default audio route and video encoding bitrate are different in different channel profiles. For details, see and .
The default video encoding bitrate are different in different channel profiles. For details, see .

p.props: ios mac cpp electron unity flutter rn

pd.p:
The channel profile.
(0): Communication. Use this profile when there are only two users in the channel.
(1): Live streaming. Use this profile when there are more than two users in the channel.
(2): This profile is deprecated.
(3): Interaction. The scenario is optimized for latency. Use this profile if the use case requires frequent interactions between users.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown; you need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly.

ul.li:
< 0: Failure.
-2: The parameter is invalid.
-7: The SDK is not initialized.
